Move points


for (let i = 0; i < points.length; i++) {
	const p = points[i];
	p.x = Math.random() * 50 - 25;
}

Follow mouse


const p = points[0];
p.x = mouse.x;
p.y = mouse.y;

Keep a constant distance


const distance = 50;

const p0 = points[0];
const p1 = points[1];

const dx = p1.x - p0.x;
const dy = p1.y - p0.y;
const dd = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);

if (dd > distance) {
	const angle = atan2(dy, dx);

	p1.x = p0.x + distance * cos(angle);
	p1.y = p0.y + distance * sin(angle);
}

Apply to all


for (let i = 1; i < points.length; i++) {
	const pp = points[i - 1];
	const p = points[i];

	const dx = p.x - pp.x;
	const dy = p.y - pp.y;
	const dd = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);

	if (dd > distance) {
		const angle = atan2(dy, dx);

		p.x = pp.x + distance * cos(angle);
		p.y = pp.y + distance * sin(angle);
	}
}

Make it elastic


for (let i = points.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
	// define pp, p, dx, dy, dd as before
	
	p.vx *= 0.9;
	p.vy *= 0.9;

	p.x += p.vx;
	p.y += p.vy;

Make it elastic


const ox = p.x;
const oy = p.y;	

if (dd > distance) {
	const angle = atan2(dy, dx);

	p.x = pp.x + distance * cos(angle);
	p.y = pp.y + distance * sin(angle);

	p.vx += (p.x - ox) * 0.1;
	p.vy += (p.y - oy) * 0.1;
}

Stop clearing the canvas

Adjust the colors


ctx.globalCompositeOperation = 'lighter';
ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 170, 0, 0.1)';
